title: Best Western launches winter sale with cheap UK hotels perfect for a mini-break
text:

Best Western is giving Brits the chance to beat the impending winter blues by booking in a cheap getaway.

The hotel chain has launched a huge winter sale with discounts of up to 30 per cent off its hotels on bed and breakfast stays.

You'll be spoiled for choice of UK destinations as the discounts are valid on over 260 independent hotels, so it's ideal whether you're thinking of a city break, countryside retreat or looking for a seaside escape.

The best part is that the deals are for stays until the 31st March 2020 meaning there's ample opportunity to bag a last minute deal or book ahead.

Oh, and that includes key dates such as October half term, the festive period and February half term, meaning families tied to the school holiday dates won't be left out.

(Image: iStockphoto)

To make use of the deals, you'll need to join the Best Western Rewards scheme - it's free to join and you can sign up here . You can also sign up during the booking process.

All of the deals are already available on the Best Western website but you'll need to be quick as the offers are subject to availability.

To give you a helping hand, we've picked out the top three deals that caught our attention below...

London from £63pp : Stay at the Best Western Palm Hotel on a bed and breakfast basis. Price based on two adults sharing a room.

Stay at the Best Western Palm Hotel on a bed and breakfast basis. Price based on two adults sharing a room. Edinburgh from £64pp : Stay at the Best Western plus Bruntsfield Hotel on a bed and breakfast basis. Price based on two adults sharing a room.

Stay at the Best Western plus Bruntsfield Hotel on a bed and breakfast basis. Price based on two adults sharing a room. Lake District from £77pp : Stay at the Stonecross Manor Hotel, a BW Signature Collection by Best Western, on a bed and breakfast basis. Price based on two adults sharing a room.

Rob Paterson, CEO at Best Western GB, said: "As the long nights descend, we are thrilled to launch our ‘Winter On’ offer for our guests and provide even more of a reason for people to choose to stay with Best Western.

"We have over 260 distinctive hotels in Great Britain alone and our brilliantly different collection of independent hotels proudly provide a memorable experience with every visit."

All prices correct at the time of writing but are subject to availability and change.
description: Best Western's winter sale has discounts of up to 30 per cent and there are some cheap rooms up for grabs
